function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of cure or vaccine for tuberculosis","Impact":"Widespread transmission and high mortality rates","Mitigation":"Development of a cure or vaccine, implementation of effective public health measures","Technologies":"Vaccination technology, medical research and development, public health infrastructure","People":"Public at large, healthcare workers, individuals with compromised immune systems","Owner":"Public health organizations, pharmaceutical companies, government health departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate environmental and behavioral interventions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective environmental and behavioral interventions, public health education and awareness","Technologies":"Environmental design, ventilation systems, public health campaigns","People":"Urban residents, city planners, policymakers","Owner":"City planning authorities, public health agencies, government"}]}
